Verses: 1 appozhudhu Yoseppu Than Thagappanudaiya Mugaththinmel Vizhundhu, Azhudhu, Avanai Muththamseydhaan.
2 pinbu, Than Thagappanukkuch Sugandhavarkkamidumpadi Yoseppu Than Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Vaiththiyarukkuk Kattalaiyittaan; Appadiye Vaiththiyar Isravelukkuch Sukandhavarkkamittaargal.
3 sugandhavarkkamida Naarpadhunaal Sellum; Appadiy Andha Naatkal Niraiverina. Egipthiyar Avanukkaaga Ezhuvadhunaal Dhukkamkondaadinaargal.

4 dhukkamkondaadum Naatkal Mudindhapin, Yoseppu Paarvonin Kudumbaththaarai Nokki: Ungal Kangalil Enakkuth Dhayavukidaiththadhaanaal, Neengal Paarvonudaiya Kaadhu Ketka Avarukku Arivikkavendiyadhu Ennavendraal,

5 en Thagappanaar Ennai Nokki: Idho, Naan Maranamadaiyappogiren; Kaanaan Dhesaththile Naan Enakkaaga Vettivaiththirukkira Kallaraiyile Ennai Adakkampannuvaayaaga Endru Ennidaththil Solli, Aanaiyiduviththukkondaar; Naan Ange Poi, En Thagappanai Adakkampanni Varuvadharku Uththaravukodukka Vendikkollugiren Endru Sollungal Endraan.
6 adharkup Paarvon: Un Thagappan Unnidaththil Aanaiyiduviththabadiye, Nee Poi, Avarai Adakkampanni Vaa Endraan.
7 appadiye Yoseppu Than Thagappanai Adakkampannap Ponaan. Paarvonudaiya Aramanaiyilirundha Periyavargalaagiya Avanudaiya Sagala Udhthiyogastharum Egipthudhesaththilulla Sagala Periyorum,
8 yoseppin Veettaar Yaavarum, Avan Sagodhararum, Avan Thagappan Veettaarum Avanodekoodap Ponaargal. Thangal Kuzhandhaigalaiyum, Thangal Aadumaadugalaiyum Maaththiram Kosen Naattile Vittup Ponaargal.
9 iradhangalum Kudhiraiveerarum Avanode Ponadhinaal, Parivaarakkoottam Migavum Adhigamaayirundhadhu.
10 avargal Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyil Irukkira Aaththaaththin Porkkalaththil Vandhapodhu, Avvidaththile Perum Pulambalaagap Pulambinaargal. Ange Than Thagappanukkaaga Ezhunaal Dhukkamkondaadinaan.

11 aaththaaththin Kalaththile Thukkamkondaadugiradhai Adhdhesaththin Kudigalaagiya Kaanaaniyar Kandu: Idhu Egipthiyarukkup Periya Dhukkamkonadadal Endraargal. Adhinaal Yordhaanukku Appaal Irukkira Andha Sthalaththirku Aapelmisraayeem Ennum Per Undaayitru.
12 yaakkobin Kumaarar, Thangalukkuk Kattalaiyittirundhabadiye,

13 avanaik Kaanaan Dhesaththukkuk Kondupoi, Aabiragaam Mamrekku Edhire Irukkira Makpelaa Ennum Nilaththile Thanakkuch Shondhak Kallarai Boomiyaaga Eththiyanaagiya Ebberonidaththil Vaangina Nilaththilulla Kugaiyile Avanai Adakkampanninaargal.
14 yoseppu Than Thagappganai Adakkampanninapinbu, Avanum Avan Sagodhararum, Avanudaiya Thagappanai Adakkampannuvadharku Avanodekoodap Ponavargal Yaavarum Egipthukkuth Thirumbinaargal.

15 thangal Thagappan Maranamadaindhadhai Yoseppin Sagodharar Kandu: Oru Velai Yoseppu Nammaip Pagaiththu, Naam Avanukkuch Seydha Ellaap Pollaangukkaagavum Namakkuch Sarikkuch Sarikkattuvaan Endru Solli, Yoseppinidaththil Aal Anuppi,

16 ummudaiya Sagodharar Umakkup Pollaangu Seydhirundhaalum, Avargal Seydha Dhurogaththaiyum Paadhagaththaiyum Neer Dhayavuseydhu Mannikkavendum Endru Ummudaiya Thagappanaar Maranamadaiyumunne, Umakkuch Sollumbadi Kattalaiyittaar.

17 aagaiyaal, Ummudaiya Thagappanaarudaiya Dhevanukku Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Naangal Seydha Dhurogaththai Mannikkavendum Endru Avanukkuch Sollach Sonnaargal. Avargal Adhai Yoseppukkuch Sonnapodhu, Avan Azhudhaan.
18 pinbu, Avanudaiya Sagodhararum Poi, Avanukku Munbaakath Thaazhavizhundhu: Idho, Naangal Umakku Adimaigal Endraargal.
19 yoseppu Avargalai Nokki: Bayappadaadhirungal; Naan Dhevanaa;
20 neengal Enakkuth Theemaiseyya Ninaiththeergal; Dhevano, Ippozhudhu Nadandhuvarugirabadiye, Veku Janangalai Uyirode Kaakkumbadikku, Adhai Nanmaiyaaga Mudiyappanninaar.
21 aadhalaal, Bayappataadhirungal; Naan Ungalaiyum Ungal Kuzhandhaigalaiyum Paraamarippen Endru, Avargalukku Aarudhal Solli, Avargalode Patchamaaip Pesinaan.
22 yoseppum Avan Thagappan Kudumbaththaarum Egipthile Kudiyirundhaargal. Yoseppu Nootruppaththu Varusham Uyirotirundhaan.
23 yoseppu Eppiraayeemukkup Pirandha Moondraam Thalaimuraip Pillaigalaiyum Kandaan; Manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Maakeerin Pillaigalum Yoseppin Madiyil Valarkkappattaargal.

24 yoseppu Than Sagodhararai Nokki: Naan Maranamadaiyappogiren; Aanaalum Dhevan Ungalai Nichchayamaaich Sandhiththu, Neengal Indhath Dhesaththai Vittu, Thaam Aabiragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Aanaiyittuk Koduththirukkira Dhesaththukkup Pogappannuvaar Endru Sonnadhumandri;
25 dhevan Ungalaich Sandhikkumbodhu, En Elumbugalai Ivvidaththilirundhu Kondupoveergalaaga Endrum Solli; Yoseppu Isravel Puththiraridaththil Aanaiyiduviththukkondaan.
26 yoseppu Nootruppaththu Vayadhullavanaai Mariththaan. Avanukkuch Sugandhavarkkamittu, Egipthu Dhesaththil Avanai Oru Pettiyile Vaiththuvaiththaargal.
